title: RENOWNED JOURNALIST LUCY EWEBANK AWARDED COLLEGE STUDENT THE GOAT PEN HONOR!!!
author: Miranda Lambert
content: [Player's username], a journalism major student from Green Meadow University, has earned the Goat Pen Hornor with her original story covering the university officials' corruption issues. [Player's username] received this award from Lucy Ewebank, a well-respected journalist of Green Meadow. [Player's username] told us, "Ms. Lucy Ewebank has always been a role model to me. Receiving this award from her means the whole world to me!

title: SHEEPCOIN IN SHAMBLES
author: Hairy Mittens
content: Cryptofurrency.org have announced on their website that SheepCoin has hit a new low after rumours about the cryptofurrency environmentel impact on Green Meadow

title: Financier Turned Fashion Mogul
author: Kent Ramsbottom
content: Bruce Bighorn initially made his fortune on the Flock Market. He now rns a successful factory which produces some of the finest sweaters in Green Meadows under the label, Baahlenciaga. You should checking out this AMAZING brand!

title: Bruce Bighorn and Goldie Shearling: Who are they, really?
author: Miranda Lambert
content: Tune in to the mayor election! Get to know your mayoral candidates! We spoke to Bruce Bighorn about his love of astronomy, singing opera outdoors at night, and his favourite item of clothing: a vintage red cape gifted to him by an old human friend. His opponent, Goldie Shearling, told us all about her favourite morning strolls in the countryside and gave us her winning green smoothie recipe!

title: UFOs IN GREEN MEADOWS SKIES!!!
content: An unidentified flying object was seen in the skies over Green Meadows last Tuesday. The object appeared to be large enough to be a spacecraft and was seen buzzzzing over Shirley Shearing's farm in the early hours.

title: Goldie Shearling Takes the Cake! Former Green Meadows Baker Shines in First Campaign Speech
content: I've lived in Green Meadows all of my life. It has been my pleasure to serve you as a baker for the last 15 years, and I would like to continue to serve as your mayor! I know this town's needs: we must  support our schools and make this a safe and thriving community!

title: Mysterious Fluff Found
author: Lucy Ewebank
content: Bunches of wool found in Bighorn's office and nearby hallway. Is he grooming, or is there a different explanation. Bighorn argues he was getting a sharp haircut for the big media appearance

title: THE RICHEST IN GREEN MEADOW WAS FOUND  TO HAVE AN AFFAIR
author: @joejohnson1234
content: Preston Muttonchop am caught with another! Poor Mrs. Muttonchop -- hopefully she didn't sign a prenup!

title: Where is Lucy Ewebank?
author: @floraflockdown
content: Journalist Missing! Last seen 2 days ago. She was tracking down a big story. #whereslucy?

title: !!Behind Goldie Shearling!!
author: @solacioussally
content: Goldie may appear to be a gurrl-next-door kind of person but my..oh..my, her family is one to watch out for! Goldie's cosin--Oliver Shearling was caught in a sweater-factory scandal back in 2010. Is it connected to Goldie? Do we trust Goldie for running for a mayor position?

title: Whispers from inside Goldie's campaign indicate Lucy was a spy -- and a double crosser!!!
author: Mark Ramshorn
content: Anonymous sources inside the Shearling campaign indicate that Lucy Ewebank, who has now been mising for 4 days!! was hired by them to spy on Bruce Bighorn's campaign. Can you believe it?!  Her jab was too find weaknessses Goldie Shearing could use against him.

title: SCHOOLS SERVING MEAT? OUTRAGE AMONG GREEN MEADOWS' PARENTS!!!
author: Belinda Merino
source: Spinning the Yarn with Willy Woolworth (for radio)
content: Parents are outraged and holding a protest in front of Green Meadows School. Some     them have found suspicious meat-like leftovers in their children's lunchboxes. I feel like I was betrayed by this decision by the school committee. We want full transparency of who is behind this!

title: Concern Arises Over Missing Journalist
author: Belinda Merino
content: Renowned investigative journalist Lucy Ewebank hasn't been seen by colleagues or loved ones for 1 day.

title: Green Meadows?! Clean Meadows?!
author: @TheGarlicPress
content: A group of sheep from neighboring pink meedows found to be irresponsible they left litter all around green meedows.

title: A promise that was never delivered???
author: Baaarbra Wooly
content: Goldie Shearling once promised the community members a grand fundraising bake sale for a new public playground. It never happened!

title: Rams' Wide Receiver Out for Season; Cause Unknown
content: The Rams revealed today that their star wide receiver, Phil 'Lights Out' Dreamer, was miss the remainder of the season. When asked to elaborate, Rams' General Manager Brian Shorn repleeed, 'no comment.'

title: Bighorn is from GMU:
author: @BigBruce
source:
Bighorn's personal accrount @BigBruce reshares and replies to a post -- 'not true'

Originally posed on The Fencepost website
content: 'Did Bighorn Pad his Resume? Rumors fly that Candidate for Mayor NOT a GMU alum!'

title: Apologizes for Unfulfilled Playground Promise
author: GodieShearling
content: I apologize for never holding the bake sale to build the playground for our lambs. It was my intention to have the bake sale, and if I become the Mayor, I commit to raising funds for our new playground.

title: Journalist Remains Missing
author: Lloyd Lambswool
content: Journalist Lucy Ewebank, political reporter for The Green Meadows Gazette, remains missing after 3 days. She was last seen near the factory belonging to mayoral candidate Bruce Bighorn, whom she was investigating.

title: What is going on in Green Meadows' schools?
content: Lunch room are supposedly served a meat-like product -- could it be actual meat?  What is the purpose of such a decision? Lunch ladies report a new supplier for produce in the schools.

title: Old Pictures of Bighorn's personal connection with local Shafia(Mafia Baahfia?) leader
author: Flora Flockdown
content: Old pictures of Bighorn standing next to the local shafia leader have been circulateing online. The local Shafia has a long criminal history that's pretty accessible to the sheeps. One of them was that he/she was involved in the black market transaction of good quality wool! What are Bruce's connections to the Shafia?

title: POISONING AT LOCAL RESTAURANT
author: Baarbra Woolly
content: Two sheep who dined at the local restaurant Marten's on Tuesday were taken to the hospital. Both showed signs of [food] poisoning. Officer Gray, who specialises in poisoning cases, says that most of the time such cases are accidental. Officer Gray says that it's most likely there is no concern about a murder -- just about moldy grass
